function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortcomings of existing housing stock becoming more noticeable","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and poor living conditions","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation, sanitation, and overall building quality","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, antimicrobial surfaces, air purifiers","People":"Residents, especially those living in inadequate housing","Owner":"Government, urban planners, building developers"},{"Description":"Overproduction of residential buildings due to market policy","Impact":"Increased urban density, overcrowding, and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing better urban planning regulations, promoting mixed-use development, and addressing affordable housing needs","Technologies":"Urban planning software, affordable housing initiatives, mixed-use zoning strategies","People":"Urban residents, low-income households, urban planners","Owner":"Government, urban planning authorities, housing developers"},{"Description":"Reduction in goods solely viewed through market value","Impact":"Inadequate access to essential goods and services, leading to health disparities and vulnerability to disease","Mitigation":"Promoting equitable access to healthcare, education, and basic necessities, and supporting community resilience initiatives","Technologies":"Community health mapping, telemedicine, digital educational platforms","People":"Low-income individuals, marginalized communities, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, community organizations, healthcare providers"}]}
